name: Glo Dollar
description: Glo is the anti-poverty version of the dollar. Lift people out of poverty by adopting the Glo Dollar. Glo will be 1:1 backed by the Glo Reserve. Glo is a nonprofit. When Glo is live, we'll make money by investing the Glo Reserve in bondsâ€”but we'll donate 100% to GiveDirectly.
